text: kah do, "vah saty hai tumhaare rab kee or se. to ab jo koee chaahe maane aur jo chaahe inakaar kar de." hamane to atyaachaariyon ke lie aag taiyaar kar rakhee hai, jisakee qanaaton ne unhen gher liya hai. yadi ve fariyaad karenge to fariyaad ke pratyuttar mein unhen aisa paanee milega jo tel kee talachhat jaisa hoga; vah unake munh bhoon daalega. bahut hee bura hai vah pey aur bahut hee bura hai vah vishraamasthal
